t: For Amazon, Mall Is Beautiful
s: August 10, 2020 - The largest shopping mall owner in the United States, Simon Property Group, is in talks with Amazon to convert some premises being made vacant due to the collapse of department store chains such as J.C. Penney or Sears into fulfilment centers for the company.
